extendedInfo.detail: 0 g trans fat per serving. 12 g fat per serving. Per 1 Tbsp: 110 calories; 3.5 g sat fat (18% DV); 0 mg sodium (0% DV); 0 g total sugars. Crisco shortening: 3.5 g saturated fat per tablespoon. Butter: 7 g saturated fat per tablespoon. Crisco shortening contains 12 g total fat per serving.  Gluten free.  50% less saturated fat than butter (50% less saturated fat than butter). See nutrition information for fat and saturated fat content. Excellent source of ALA Omega-3 fatty acid. Contains 710 mg of ALA per serving, which is 44% the 1.6 g daily value for ALA. See nutrition information for fat and saturated fat content. Not a low calorie food.  Great for baking & frying. Use instead of butter or margarine. How to substitute Crisco shortening for butter or margarine: 1 cup Crisco shortening = 1 cup butter or margarine spread. Not intended for use as a spread. Questions? Comments? 1-800-766-7309. Crisco.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Soybean Oil, Fully Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Palm Oil, Mono And Diglycerides, TBHQ And Citric Acid (Antioxidants).
extendedInfo.directions: See directions for use. Use for baking and frying.  For easier blending, do not refrigerate.  For best results, use within one year of opening.
extendedInfo.warnings: Do not expose can to heat. Do not refill with hot oil. Warning: Shortening will catch fire if overheated. Damage or serious burns may result. Do heat shortening carefully, uncovered, on medium heat. Do reduce heat if smoking occurs. Do not leave unattended while heating. Do not refill can with hot shortening. If shortening catches fire: Do turn off heat. Do cover pot until cooled to room temperature to avoid reignition. Do not carry pot until cool. Do not put water on hot or flaming shortening.
